statements: SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT property_id, sale_price FROM historical_sales WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown';
SELECT MAX(sale_price) FROM historical_sales;
SELECT property_id, sale_date, square_feet FROM historical_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, sale_price, neighborhood FROM historical_sales WHERE square_feet > 2000;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE property_type = 'Condo' ORDER BY sale_price DESC, sale_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, sale_price FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT neighborhood, AVG(sale_price) AS avg_price FROM historical_sales GROUP BY neighborhood ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type, square_feet FROM historical_sales WHERE square_feet > 2000 AND neighborhood = 'Downtown' ORDER BY property_id;
SELECT property_type, COUNT(*) AS num_sales FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_price > 500000 GROUP BY property_type HAVING num_sales > 5 ORDER BY num_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT property_address, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100000;
SELECT property_address, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT trend_id, trend_data->'$.city' AS city FROM market_trends;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, property_address FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 50000 AND property_address LIKE '123%';
SELECT MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount, MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY property_address HAVING total_sales > 2;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales;
SELECT property_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM historical_sales;
SELECT buyer_name, sale_price FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT property_type, property_size, property_location FROM property_details;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, market_value FROM market_analysis WHERE market_trend = 'up';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE property_id = 123 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT buyer_name, sale_price FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_price ASC
SELECT property_type, property_size FROM property_details WHERE property_size > 500 ORDER BY property_size DESC
SELECT property_location, last_sold_date FROM property_details WHERE last_sold_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY last_sold_date ASC
SELECT property_id, market_value FROM market_analysis ORDER BY market_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_type, sale_price FROM sales_data WHERE property_location='New York' AND sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_location, median_property_value FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_type, property_size_sqft FROM property_details WHERE property_year_built > 2000 ORDER BY property_size_sqft DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_type, forecasted_price, confidence_score FROM forecasted_values ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_price DESC, sale_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_type, AVG(sale_price) AS avg_price FROM sales_data GROUP BY property_type HAVING avg_price > 500000 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE sales_volume > 1000 AND trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;

SELECT pd.property_id, pd.property_location, fv.forecasted_price FROM property_details pd JOIN forecasted_values fv ON pd.property_id = fv.property_id WHERE fv.confidence_score > 0.8 ORDER BY fv.forecast_date ASC;
SELECT distinct property_type FROM sales_data WHERE property_location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY property_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM Properties;
SELECT property_id, address FROM Properties ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_price >= 100000;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM Buyers WHERE buyer_id IN (1, 5);
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_price > 500000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, address, year_built FROM Properties WHERE year_built BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY address ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT Agents.name, Agents.email, count(Sales.sale_id) AS total_sales FROM Agents JOIN Sales ON Agents.agent_id = Sales.property_id GROUP BY Agents.agent_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

SELECT Properties.address, Properties.property_type, AVG(Sales.sale_price) AS avg_sale_price FROM Properties JOIN Sales ON Properties.property_id = Sales.property_id GROUP BY Properties.property_id HAVING avg_sale_price > 200000 ORDER BY avg_sale_price DESC;
SELECT Buyers.name, COUNT(Sales.sale_id) AS total_purchases FROM Buyers JOIN Sales ON Buyers.buyer_id = Sales.buyer_id GROUP BY Buyers.buyer_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 5;
